Define Documentation

#define SELECT

Value:

FD_ZERO(&readfds);                        \
                  FD_SET(0, &readfds);            \
                  FD_SET(cpcfd, &readfds);            \
                  tv.tv_sec  = 0;                       \
                  tv.tv_usec = 500000;                    \
                  nfds = select(cpcfd+1, &readfds, NULL, NULL, &tv);

#define SELECT_WR

Value:

FD_ZERO(&writefds);                                 \
                  FD_SET(0, &readfds);                                \
                  FD_SET(cpcfd, &writefds);                           \
                  tv.tv_sec  = 0;                                     \
                  tv.tv_usec = 500000;                                \
                  nfds = select(cpcfd+1, NULL, &writefds, NULL, &tv);

Function Documentation

void canHWInit (  ) 

Initialize the serial port

Note:
Same function name in libserial.c than in libcan.c to easy switch from CAN to RS232 using libepos.c
